pr_title: ground items: remove Highlight > value, add Notify >= Tier

timeline.message: ground items: move repeated notify code into notifyHighlightedItem

timeline.bodyText: I'm tempted to say this should be public long getValueFromTier(GroundItemsConfig config) and use Long.MAX_VALUE as the default case value just so we never run into some weird edge case with some future max-cash-value item drop.
timeline.author: Nightfirecat
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,53 @@

+
+import net.runelite.client.plugins.grounditems.GroundItemsConfig;
+
+public enum HighlightTier
+{
+	OFF,
+	LOW,
+	MEDIUM,
+	HIGH,
+	INSANE;
+
+	public int getValueFromTier(GroundItemsConfig config)

timeline.bodyText: Can this change be moved to the first commit? It has nothing to do with Notify >= Tier
timeline.author: Nightfirecat

replies.bodyText: It's in this commit since before, the code wasn't duplicated.
replies.author: Hydrox6

timeline.bodyText: Isn't config.notifyTier() == HighlightTier.OFF already implicitly covered by the getValueFromTier() method call in shouldNotifyTier?
timeline.author: Nightfirecat

timeline.bodyText: I would change this to return Long and then null-check and mark the method nullable, Long.MAX_VALUE is pretty ugly way to determine if highlight tier is off (or simply check if highlight tier is OFF and then skip)
timeline.author: deathbeam
